title: Precipitation
text:
CHIRPS compare with https://www.mdpi.com/2073-4441/12/5/1244


Code
amazonia <- read_sf("results/data/amazonia/") %>% 
  st_union() %>% 
  st_sf()
chirps <- rast("results/data/precipitation/chirps_tau.nc") %>% 
  mask(amazonia) %>% 
  project(amazonia) %>% 
  as.data.frame(xy = T) %>% 
  filter(pval < 0.05) %>% 
  dplyr::select(-pval) %>% 
  rast()
ggplot() +
  tidyterra::geom_spatraster(data = chirps) +
  geom_sf(data = amazonia, fill = NA) +
  theme_bw() +
  scale_fill_gradient2(expression(tau), na.value = NA) 





Caption.






Code
anom5 <- rast("results/data/precipitation/chirps_anom.nc")[[39:44]] %>% 
  mean() %>% 
  resample(chirps) %>% 
  mask(chirps) %>% 
  mask(amazonia) %>% 
  project(amazonia)
ggplot() +
  tidyterra::geom_spatraster(data = anom5) +
  geom_sf(data = amazonia, fill = NA) +
  theme_bw() +
  scale_fill_gradient2("5 years anomaly", na.value = NA)

title: Forest
text:
TMF
wip


Code
rast("results/data/forest/tmf.nc") %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  gather(year, value) %>% 
  mutate(year = as.numeric(gsub("tmf_year=", "", year))) %>% 
  mutate(type = recode(value, 
                       "1" = "undisturbed",
                       "2" = "degraded",
                       "3" = "deforested",
                       "4" = "regrowth",
                       "5" = "water",
                       "6" = "other")) %>% 
  group_by(year, type) %>% 
  summarise(N = n()) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(year, N, col = type)) +
  geom_line() +
  theme_bw()

title: Literature
text:
To read

Van Passel et al. (2024) good method, data and codes shared
Hammond et al. (2022)
Wunderling et al. (2022) network for moisture recycling
Verbesselt et al. (2016)
Anderegg, Anderegg, and Huang (2019)
Bousquet et al. (2022)
Smith and Boers (2023) open python codes including tau
Anderson et al. (2018)
Liu et al. (2019) early warning system (EWS) using bayesian dynamic linear model (DLM)
Slette, Post, et al. (2019); Zang et al. (2019) ; Slette, Smith, et al. (2019) on SPEI usage
